name: Raichu
description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
evolutions: Pikachu evolves into Raichu using a stone.

name: Tangela
description: Many writhing vines cover it, so its true identity remains unknown. The blue vines grow its whole life long.
evolutions: Tangela evolves into Tangrowth at level undefined.

name: Machoke
description: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.
evolutions: Machop evolves into Machoke at level 28.

name: Pikachu
description: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
evolutions: Pichu evolves into Pikachu when leveled up with high friendship.

name: Poliwrath
description: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
evolutions: Poliwhirl evolves into Poliwrath using a stone.

name: Kadabra
description: It stares at its silver spoon to focus its mind. It emits more alpha waves while doing so.
evolutions: Abra evolves into Kadabra at level 16.

name: Charizard
description: It is said that Charizards fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.
evolutions: Charmeleon evolves into Charizard at level 36.

name: Fraxure
description: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.
evolutions: Axew evolves into Fraxure at level 38.

name: Sandslash
description: The spikes on its body are made up of its hardened hide. It rolls up and attacks foes with its spikes.
evolutions: Sandshrew evolves into Sandslash at level 22.

name: Glalie
description: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
evolutions: Snorunt evolves into Glalie at level 42.

name: Abra
description: Using its psychic power is such a strain on its brain that it needs to sleep for 18 hours a day.
evolutions: Abra evolves into Kadabra at level 16.

name: Vanillite
description: Theoretically, this Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. Their breath is -58 F.
evolutions: Vanillite evolves into Vanillish at level 35.

name: Hitmonlee
description: Its legs can stretch double. First-time foes are startled by its extensible reach.
evolutions: Tyrogue evolves into Hitmonlee at level 20.

name: Graveler
description: It rolls on mountain paths to move. Once it builds momentum, no Pokémon can stop it without difficulty.
evolutions: Geodude evolves into Graveler at level 25.

name: Weedle
description: It eats its weight in leaves every day. It fends off attackers with the needle on its head.
evolutions: Weedle evolves into Kakuna at level 7.

name: Cleffa
description: According to local rumors, Cleffa are often seen in places where shooting stars have fallen.
evolutions: Cleffa evolves into Clefairy when leveled up with high friendship.

name: Magnemite
description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.
evolutions: Magnemite evolves into Magneton at level 30.

name: Druddigon
description: It runs through the narrow tunnels formed by Excadrill and Onix. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.

name: Bulbasaur
description: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
evolutions: Bulbasaur evolves into Ivysaur at level 16.

name: Axew
description: Its large tusks have a tendency to break, but each time they grow back, they grow in harder and sturdier.
evolutions: Axew evolves into Fraxure at level 38.

name: Vulpix
description: As each tail grows, its fur becomes more lustrous. When held, it feels slightly warm.
evolutions: Vulpix evolves into Ninetales using a stone.

name: Tyranitar
description: The quakes caused when it walks make even great mountains crumble and change the surrounding terrain.
evolutions: Pupitar evolves into Tyranitar at level 55.

name: Sandshrew
description: It digs deep burrows to live in. When in danger, it rolls up its body to withstand attacks.
evolutions: Sandshrew evolves into Sandslash at level 22.

name: Dialga
description: A legendary Pokémon of Sinnoh. It is said that time flows when Dialgas heart beats.

name: Raticate
description: With its long fangs, this surprisingly violent Pokémon can gnaw away even thick concrete with ease.
evolutions: Rattata evolves into Raticate at level 20.

name: Kakuna
description: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
evolutions: Weedle evolves into Kakuna at level 7.

name: Banette
description: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge of being thrown away. It seeks the child who disowned it.
evolutions: Shuppet evolves into Banette at level 37.

name: Poliwhirl
description: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.
evolutions: Poliwag evolves into Poliwhirl at level 25.

name: Haxorus
description: Its tusks are incredibly destructive. They can easily slice through a thick, sturdy steel column every time.
evolutions: Fraxure evolves into Haxorus at level 48.

name: Alakazam
description: The spoons clutched in its hands are said to have been created by its psychic powers.
evolutions: Kadabra evolves into Alakazam by trading.

name: Golem
description: Even dynamite cant harm its hard, boulder-like body. It sheds its hide just once a year.
evolutions: Graveler evolves into Golem by trading.

name: Pidgey
description: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.
evolutions: Pidgey evolves into Pidgeotto at level 18.

name: Electabuzz
description: Research is progressing on storing lightning in Electabuzz so this energy can be used at any time.
evolutions: Elekid evolves into Electabuzz when leveled up with high friendship.

name: Geodude
description: At rest, it looks just like a rock. Carelessly stepping on it will make it swing its fists angrily.
evolutions: Geodude evolves into Graveler at level 25.

name: Butterfree
description: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
evolutions: Metapod evolves into Butterfree at level 10.

name: Squirtle
description: It shelters itself in its shell then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.
evolutions: Squirtle evolves into Wartortle at level 16.

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flowers coming bloom.
evolutions: Bulbasaur evolves into Ivysaur at level 16.

name: Poochyena
description: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
evolutions: Poochyena evolves into Mightyena at level 18.

name: Pidgeot
description: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.
evolutions: Pidgeotto evolves into Pidgeot at level 36.

name: Rattata
description: It searches for food all day. It gnaws on hard objects to wear down its fangs, which grow constantly during its lifetime.
evolutions: Rattata evolves into Raticate at level 20.

name: Clefairy
description: On nights with a full moon, Clefairy gather from all over and dance. Bathing in moonlight makes them float.
evolutions: Cleffa evolves into Clefairy when leveled up with high friendship.

name: Snorunt
description: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
evolutions: Snorunt evolves into Glalie at level 42.

name: Nosepass
description: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.
evolutions: Nosepass evolves into Probopass at level undefined.

name: Caterpie
description: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
evolutions: Caterpie evolves into Metapod at level 7.

name: Blastoise
description: The jets of water it spouts from the rocket cannons on its shell can punch through thick steel.
evolutions: Wartortle evolves into Blastoise at level 36.

name: Machamp
description: Its four muscled arms slam foes with powerful punches and chops at blinding speed.
evolutions: Machoke evolves into Machamp by trading.

name: Metapod
description: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.
evolutions: Caterpie evolves into Metapod at level 7.

name: Togepi
description: It transforms the kindness and joy of others into happiness, which it stores in its shell.
evolutions: Togepi evolves into Togetic when leveled up with high friendship.

name: Venusaur
description: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
evolutions: Ivysaur evolves into Venusaur at level 32.

name: Charmander
description: The fire on the tip of its tail is a measure of its life. If healthy, its tail burns intensely.
evolutions: Charmander evolves into Charmeleon at level 16.

name: Magneton
description: The stronger electromagnetic waves from the three linked Magnemite are enough to dry out surrounding moisture.
evolutions: Magnemite evolves into Magneton at level 30.

name: Sneasel
description: A smart and sneaky Pokémon, it makes its opponents flinch by suddenly showing the claws hidden in its paws.
evolutions: Sneasel evolves into Weavile at level undefined.

name: Machop
description: Though small in stature, it is powerful enough to easily heft and throw a number of Geodude at once.
evolutions: Machop evolves into Machoke at level 28.

name: Charmeleon
description: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
evolutions: Charmander evolves into Charmeleon at level 16.

name: Mightyena
description: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
evolutions: Poochyena evolves into Mightyena at level 18.

name: Pidgeotto
description: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.
evolutions: Pidgey evolves into Pidgeotto at level 18.

name: Sableye
description: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.

name: Ninetales
description: Each of its nine tails is imbued with supernatural power, and it can live for a thousand years.
evolutions: Vulpix evolves into Ninetales using a stone.

name: Meganium
description: Its breath has the fantastic ability to revive dead plants and flowers.
evolutions: Bayleef evolves into Meganium at level 32.

name: Duskull
description: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.
evolutions: Duskull evolves into Dusclops at level 37.

name: Clefable
description: Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so theyre usually found in quiet places.
evolutions: Clefairy evolves into Clefable using a stone.

name: Mr. Mime
description: It shapes an invisible wall in midair by minutely vibrating its fingertips to stop molecules in the air.
evolutions: Mime Jr. evolves into Mr. Mime when leveled up with high friendship.

name: Misdreavus
description: A Pokémon that startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.
evolutions: Misdreavus evolves into Mismagius using a stone.

name: Shuppet
description: It feeds on the dark emotions of sadness and hatred, which make it grow steadily stronger.
evolutions: Shuppet evolves into Banette at level 37.

name: Jynx
description: Its cries sound like human speech. However, it is impossible to tell what it is trying to say.
evolutions: Smoochum evolves into Jynx when leveled up with high friendship.

name: Wartortle
description: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.
evolutions: Squirtle evolves into Wartortle at level 16.
